page.title: 16HOUSING IN KILREA
page.content: {HOUSING:}IN KILREA THERE ARE FARMHOUSES,COUNCIL HOUSES AND OWNER OCCUPIED HOUSES. {FARMHOUSE:}I LIVE IN A SMALL FARMHOUSE.THE HOUSE WAS RECENTLY RENOVATED.IT IS SURROUNDED BY TWO GARDENS AT THE FRONT AND ONE AT THE BACK.THERE ARE TWO STABLES ATTACHED TO THE HOUSE. {COUNCIL OR HOUSING EXECUTIVE HOUSE:}I LIVE IN AN ESTATE DOWN THE GARVAGH ROAD.THE ESTATE IS CALLED BEECHVIEW GARDENS.OUR HOUSE HAS A SMALL WORKING KITCHEN,BATHROOM AND FOUR BEDROOMS. {THE OWNER OCCUPIER:}MY HOUSE IS SITUATED IN BRIDGE STREET.MY PARENTS ARE RENOVATING THE HOUSE.ATTACHED TO THE HOUSE IS A GARAGE AND A GARDEN.
